short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SARS-CoV-2(COVID-19) Tracker - Follow the situation in areas of your interest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest way to track how the pandemic is developing in countries of your interest. Simply pick the locations and they will be automatically added to your list and they will update whenever new data is available.
